<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H1167|בַּעַל]]</big>**</small>
 <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּעֵל‎</span> ([[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 54, 3</sup> <span class="bdbLangGreek">γ</span>) **noun masculine** ==owner, lord== (Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, used similarly; compare Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בַּ֫עַל‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בָּעַל‎</span>; also [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בְּעֵיל‎</span>); — construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מְֿעֵם‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎בּ‎</span> [[Ezra.4.8|Ezra 4:8]]; [[Ezra.4.9|Ezra 4:9]]; [[Ezra.4.17|Ezra 4:17]] i.e. ***commander*** ([[BDB#Andr|Andr]]<sup>M 56\* as translation of</sup> Persian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***fram¹t¹r***</u></abbr>, ***commander***).
